title: Olaf Scholz - Wikipedia
snippet: Olaf Scholz (born 14 June 1958) is a German politician who served as the Chancellor of Germany from 2021 to 2025. A member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD), he previously served as Vice Chancellor in the fourth Merkel cabinet and as Federal Minister of Finance from 2018 to 2021.

title: The Federal Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany | Home page
snippet: The website of Federal Chancellor Olaf Scholz. Here you can find out more about the Federal Chancellor, his activities and the responsibilities of the Federal Chancellery.

title: Olaf Scholz | Facts, Biography, Cabinet, & Chancellor of Germany | Britannica
snippet: Olaf Scholz served as chancellor of Germany from 2021 to 2025.

title: Olaf Scholz 2021 to 2025 | Federal Chancellor
snippet: Olaf Scholz (SPD) was elected ninth Federal Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany in December 2021.

title: Olaf Scholz
snippet: Olaf Scholz was Federal Chancellor from 2021 to May 2025. (Photo: Federal Government//Thomas Köhler/Photothek) Born on 14 June 1958 in Osnabrück. since 1975 Member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD)
